mapper.select: SELECT id, character_id as characterId, name, detail, price, stock, sale_status as saleStatus, is_limited as isLimited, is_deleted as isDeleted, image_path as imagePath, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM items WHERE is_deleted = false

SELECT i.id, i.name, i.detail, i.price, i.stock, i.sale_status, i.is_limited, i.is_deleted, i.image_path, i.created_at AS item_created_at, i.updated_at AS item_updated_at, c.id AS character_id, c.name AS character_name, c.created_at AS character_created_at, c.updated_at AS character_updated_at FROM items i LEFT JOIN characters c ON i.character_id = c.id WHERE i.id = #{id};
